entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Waterton Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waterton Park Gate 8:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: W 26 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
